Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Nestled in amongst Wallingtons beautiful rural landscape yet only 5 minutes to Ocean Groves main surf beach, this timber cottage is truly a rare find. On 927m2 of land (approx.) this allotment was once part of a larger land holding that has since been subdivided.
This charming, three - bedroom home offers the astute buyer a chance to acquire a property in a much sought-after pocket of Wallington without having to buy acreage, yet still have room to move.
With old world charm, the cottage is brimming with potential. Working within the existing bones of the property or renovating (STCA) the choices are endless to add your personal touches all enabling you to sit back and enjoy the rural vista that surrounds you. Providing 3 bedrooms, main with ensuite, separate lounge room, open plan kitchen and dining opening via French doors to an alfresco deck bathed in sunlight, ideal for BBQs and Gin and Tonics. There is a family bathroom and a further deck area at the rear of the house. The rear garden is vast and a blank canvas for veggie gardens, chooks etc. A storage shed is an additional bonus for the gardening enthusiast.
This property is zoned and within easy reach of the highly regarded Wallington Primary School, and the local café The Paddock, is only a short walk up away, as is Lomas Orchards where you can pick your own strawberries. For those with riding interests Koombahla Park is super close by and offers agistment opportunities. All in all, this gem of a property will be highly sought after.

Description:
The Perfect Package In Ideal Location
Sitting on a generous 541m2 approx block this seamless home offers the ideal in entry level living overlooking scenic surround farmland. Located just minutes to the Leopold Gateway plaza shopping complex, Leopold primary school and all the finest amenities of the Bellarine Peninsula.
The home itself offering 3 bedrooms, the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite with double sink. Adjacent to the master you will find the first living space with plantation shutters.
Flowing through the home you will land in the open place kitchen dining living zone. The kitchen with stone bench tops, gas cooking and walk in pantry with ample storage. The dining and second living work in harmony flowing out to the spacious outdoor entertaining space. A key feature outdoors is the side access that allows ample convenience with room to have secure off street parking for a boat, caravan, trailer etc.
Key features:
- Ducted heating, split system heat/cool & ceiling fans
- Open plan floor plan with two living zones
- Double garage, garden shed and side access
- Plantation shutters
- Ensuite with double sink
- Stone bench tops
- Large outdoor entertaining
- Generous 541m2 approx. block
- Minutes to Gateway plaza
- Minutes to Leopold primary
- 15 minute to Ocean Grove beach
- 15 Minutes to the Geelong CBD.
The perfect entry, upgrade or investment in a vibrant and popular location.

Description:
Solid home with potential views in need of a makeover.
This home has a solid foundation and is a great blank canvas waiting for someone to make it their own.
In a private court with snippets of views to the bay, the large allotment is in a quiet location. A second storey would provide commanding views of Corio bay and the You Yangs.
The home provides a functional layout that comprises 3 bedrooms, 3 living zones, 2 bathrooms, separate laundry and an undercover entertaining area. A large master bedroom is zoned at the front of the home and includes an ensuite and walk in robe.
The kitchen is open plan to the dining/living with gas cooking, plenty of storage and breakfast bar. A formal living space is at the front of the home, whilst a rumpus room is located at the rear of the home.
Slate tiles floor the main living zones, whilst the living and bedroom carpet has been removed ready for new flooring.
An undercover alfresco area opens out from the central dining / living area and looks out to the North toward the bay and over the large rear yard, whilst a single carport and storage shed complete the home.
If you are looking for a project home that just needs an aesthetic makeover and some TLC, it doesn't get more affordable than this.
Call Dion Plumb for more information on 0424 940 629

Description:
Spacious Living A Short Stroll From The Playground!
Offering spacious living in a superb location, this home presents a terrific choice for first homebuyers, investors, and families alike!
A short stroll will find you at the local playground or sporting oval, where children and adults will be entertained for hours on end. Public transport is footsteps away, while a short drive will place you at the Leopold Primary School. The Gateway Plaza is close by for all of your shopping and dining needs, while the Gateway Sanctuary entices you to venture outdoors. Easy access to Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula is the icing on the cake.
The contemporary interiors invite you to add your own touch with a splash of your favourite colour. The spacious open plan living zone flows to both the sheltered alfresco and backyard creating an indoor-outdoor connection that is perfect for everyday enjoyment. Youll love that this space can also accommodate casual barbeques with friends or lively birthday celebrations with the whole family! The large kitchen features stone benchtops, built-in pantry, and ample storage. The breakfast bar is ideal for casual dining, while stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood.
The generous lounge is great for children or teenagers who enjoy their own space.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom boasts a walk-in robe and en suite with shower, single vanity, and toilet. Three additional bedrooms are complete with built-in robes. The main bathroom, laundry with storage, separate toilet, and walk-in linen press are tucked away in a separate wing.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling keep you in the utmost comfort.
The grassy backyard provides a secure play space for children and pets, while also offering the potential for green thumbs to create their dream garden oasis.
The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while side vehicle access is ideal for storing trailers or caravans.
If youre looking for spacious living, then this home is the one for you! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Contemporary Coastal Vibe
This two-storey brick home, situated on a generous 702m² (approx), has been tastefully renovated and boasts a contemporary yet relaxed coastal aesthetic. Upstairs the harbour views are captivating and the open plan living area is spacious and light filled. The adjacent kitchen offers plentiful work and storage space and is perfectly suited to cater for everyday living and entertaining. The rumpus room provides added living space and is all about soaking up the sunshine and views. A master suite, with walk in robe and en-suite, feels like a parents haven and the adjacent study offers a handy space to work from home if required.
Downstairs takes care of the kids or guests with four generous bedrooms and a family sized bathroom with double vanity. Spread out and relax in the second living zone or out in the sunroom, which comes complete with a wet bar and easy flow to the private and fenced garden. Extra storage is always a bonus and this property has plenty of that inside and out with a freestanding double garage and garden shed too.
This magical location is becomingly increasingly well known as a peaceful corner of the Bellarine that enjoys easy access to safe swimming and ocean beaches, nature filled reserves, wineries, golf courses and spectacular scenery. Just a short commute to Geelong, the cafes and boutique shopping of nearby coastal hot spots are within easy reach too. With all the hard work done here there will be plenty of time to enjoy it all.

Description:
Versatile Site With Potential Bay Views
The Feel:
Quietly positioned in an established court location, this prime allotment provides an opportunity to capitalise on stunning views across Corio Bay within the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Design a contemporary home that takes advantage of the north facing aspect (STCA) or explore the site's development potential by utilising its planning approval for a 2 lot subdivision.
The Facts:
-785sqm approx. allotment with great potential for views
-Plans for two lot subdivision and two dwellings already approved.
-Watch boats pass by on Corio Bay with the You Yangs in the background
-Quiet court location in an established coastal neighbourhood
-Create a spacious and modern home without size limitations (STCA)
-Potential for development with hassle-free housing in high demand (STCA)
-Walk to dog friendly Beacon Point Reserve, Golf Clubs and beach
-Moments to a choice of great schools with bus connections to Geelong
-Central location minutes to wineries, coastal towns and surf beaches
-10mins to Portarlington Ferry Terminal, taking you straight into Melbourne CBD
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
A Cut Above the Rest!
What we have on offer is a rare opportunity giving the savvy buyer a whole lot of bang for their buck!
This late 80's architecturally designed home has been tastefully updated. This spacious footprint has an abundance of natural light with a pretty backdrop for each window. From the moment of entry this house will feel like home in so many ways.
Located in a sought - after pocket of Clifton Springs in a quiet court and oozing street appeal, all situated upon a whopping 706m2.
The free-flowing floorplan lends itself to practical zoning; the fore of the home has a spacious living area equipped with a fan forced Jindara wood heater. The master bedroom is generous in size with a well fitted out walk-in robe, split system and ensuite with double shower, stone vanity, toilet, storage and floor to ceiling tiles.
You will find a formal dining space and study/4th bedroom before flowing to the heart of the home. A stylish Block kitchen including stone bench tops, in bench commercial grade sink, double fridge cavity, soft closing drawers, stainless steel quality appliances including an in bench 5 burner gas stove top. The kitchen overlooks the 2nd living making entertaining a breeze. An additional split system and sliding doors leading to the undercover area completes this family space.
The remainder of the home comprises 2 additional bedrooms both with built-in-robes, main bathroom room, separate toilet and a very well-thought-out laundry with yard access.
Large double gates lead to the carport and undercover area before stepping down into a very quaint garden. Beautiful established trees dart the boundary offering privacy, the shade of the 30-year-old Elm tree and perfectly maintained grassed area is the perfect space for the kids to play. A large garden shed and pet enclosure complete this ideal setup.
Features of the home include ceiling fans in all bedrooms and 2nd living area, heating/cooling, quality fittings and fixtures, brilliant storage including loft space accessible via foldout stairs, quality window furnishings and custom light fittings.
This home is simply ideal for the growing family, downsizers and investors alike; you have a great location with the Bay at your fingertips, a spacious home where all the hard work has been done, situated upon a sizeable parcel with room for all the toys. Priced to go this well loved home will not last long.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Incredible family home!
Whether you're a growing family, active grandparents or simply like your own space, you're going to love 19 Curtain Drive!
Offering a flexible floorplan, live the way you want to! The current owner's setup is 3 bedrooms with 3 living zones, but you might decide to use one of them as a fourth bedroom. Don't worry though, you won't be compromising on space - the large central kitchen/dining/living offers an abundance of room and a wood fire makes this a magical spot in the cooler months (or when Spring disappears for a few days!). The grand alfresco extends this space perfectly and makes for a great entertaining area.
The rear lounge is absolutely massive and will accommodate all of the kid's 'stuff', or a full size snooker table with loads of room around it.
The Master has a WIR and ensuite with dual vanity and is cleverly located up the front, well away from the kid's bedrooms at the rear. They share a central bathroom with separate toilet - spot on.
Solar panels will help manage your electricity costs, and a great sized shed will suit the tinkerer, motorbike rider or collector. The double garage with internal access provides easy access to the shed with a rear roller door.
There's something for everyone of offer here - come and see for yourself.

Description:
Great Investment Opportunity
Unlock the potential of this 25 Acres (approx.) property in a central Bellarine Peninsula location, just moments from Queenscliff, Ocean Grove and Clifton Springs/Drysdale. Enjoy the luxury of having the best of the Bellarine at your fingertips, with Golf courses, award winning restaurants and wineries within close proximity. The site is to be sold as a blank canvas for you to build your dream home and enjoy a rural lifestyle in a fantastic location (STCA). The property comes with a shed to start your dream lifestyle today. Rarely does an opportunity arise to embrace rural views moments away from life's conveniences.
For further details, please contact Saurabh Gogia on 0474 000 044 or Preetham Eleti on 0400 477 777.
Photo ID required for the Inspection!

Description:
The Tranquil Treasure!
Beautifully positioned right in the heart of an exclusive pocket of Drysdale, this quality built residence it is sure to be highly sought after. The prime land holding of approximately 643m2 boasts the enviable feature of a corner allotment delivering options a plenty and the ultimate 'sea change' property prospect.
Showcasing great size and scale, landscaped gardens, double remote controlled garage, side/rear access (w/ expansive shedding) and the A+++ location ensures this 'home' is a genuine one of a kind!
4 generously proportioned bedrooms and a study. The master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe
The primary living zone consists of an open plan kitchen/family/meals area; flanked by expansive windows it is light and bright; dual glass doors provide a seamless connection to the sheltered alfresco (perfect for those who love to entertain)
The kitchen itself is beautifully appointed; expansive bench tops, excellent storage solutions complement quality fixtures and fittings
A 2nd independent living zone provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
All the modern comforts; ducted heating and cooling, decorative paving, garden shed, water tanks and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection
As impressive as this home is, it is the unique lifestyle features that creates an exciting buying prospect. Side/rear access with secure shed (high clearance) is room enough for the caravan, boat and/or the jet ski.
The A+++ location simply cannot be overstated; positioned right in the heart of a boutique pocket of Drysdale. Surrounded by impressive quality homes and perfectly placed to have all of Drysdale's amenities at arms reach (schools, medical services, fully equipped retail sector and a vibrant cafe/restaurant scene. The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wine labels, beautiful parklands, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the panoramic views of the bay

Description:
When Style & Quality Are Paramount!
Less than six years old, this quality residence showcases the perfect blend of stylish and functional living!
Set in a quiet pocket of Leopold, this location is simply superb. Public transport is a short stroll away, along with the local playground and sporting oval. The expansive Gateway Plaza is within close reach, while families will appreciate easy access to Leopold Primary School and the Leopold Community Hub. To top it all off, both the Gateway Sanctuary and Lake Conewarre are moments away for when you need to connect back to nature.
High square-set ceilings, tall doorframes, and Blackbutt timber flooring enhance the contemporary interiors.
With the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone uniting with the alfresco deck, a breezy ambience is created that inspires open-air living. Whether you want to relax under the shade of the alfresco or soak up the suns rays, this private outdoor area is an absolute treat.
The kitchen is perfection with stone waterfall benchtops, white cabinetry, and a large walk-in pantry. Pendant lights make a chic statement over the breakfast bar, while ILVE stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, canopy rangehood.
Children and teens will love the generous family room, which also opens onto the alfresco.
Zoned to the front of the home, the spacious Master Bedroom creates a peaceful retreat for busy parents. The walk-in robe and dressing room are wonderfully generous, while the en suite is graced with a large shower, dual vanity with stone benchtop, and separate toilet.
Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom, laundry, and separate toilet. The generous study is ideal for home business owners and students alike.
Ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fans keep you in the utmost comfort. Double glazed windows are featured in the Master Bedroom and study.
Lined with leafy trees, the landscaped backyard creates a secure play space for children. A selection of citrus trees invites you to enjoy fresh lemons, kaffir limes, and tangelos whenever you please. The 2000L rainwater tank with pump helps to keep your gardens in tip-top condition, while the garden shed offers storage.
The remote double lock-up garage with internal access provides secure parking.
With the elements in place for blissful family living, every inch of this home will delight! Inspect without delay!

Description:
The Entertainer's Delight
Luxury is an understatement when it comes to this amazing family home.
Upon entry, the sheer size of the property still won't sink in. Eight foot ceilings and spotted gum flooring throughout impresses before walking through the first room; the enormous master bedroom with a walk in robe and ensuite (complete with 1.8m shower and twin vanity) that are just as grand.
A 5 x 3 study, with built in desk sits across the hall from a separate living area, meaning the kids can be entertained by their favourite shows while everyone else can lounge in the main living room.
The open plan kitchen, dining and living room are the central hub of the home, with access to a plentiful walk-in pantry fit for a King... or Queen.
Three spacious bedrooms all with built in robes are serviced by a central bathroom and powder room in the same wing of the home so guests and the rest of the family don't need to walk too far.
Talk about resort living! The backyard has it's own ten person spa, undercover entertaining area and tiered tranquil gardens. An immensely private setting with high fences surrounding the property, barbecue areas and even more that's sure to impress.
In terms of storage, this home boasts a triple garage and still plenty of space for the workshop. You'll also find two garden sheds and a chook pen.
5 kilowatts of solar energy, ducted heating and reverse cycle air conditioning, stone bench tops and much more, all on a 718 sqm block. Only 500 metres from the heart of town.
Stop scrolling and call for an inspection today!

Description:
QUIET COURT LIVING WITH TASTEFUL MODERN UPDATES
This Impressive 3-bedroom, 1 bath 2 living brick home set on a generous 698m² has been fully renovated with nothing left to do but move in! Perfect for a family starting out,a downsizer wanting quiet court living or a savvy investor with a potential rent of approx $400pw. Comprising of a professionally landscaped front garden, hand crafted timber double gates opening to a long driveway leading to a double lock up garage. The lovely front veranda offers shade and a perfect spot to sit and unwind. Stepping into the home you'll be impressed by the stunning tiled floor sprawling out into the kitchen/meals and living area equipped with led downlights, block out blinds and split system heating and cooling for all year-round comfort. An upper living area located at the rear of the home offers an abundance of natural light and a leafy garden outlook with views of neighbouring Paech Park. The central kitchen boasts a walk-in pantry, glass splash backs, Caesar-stone bench tops with island, updated appliances including a Bosch dishwasher, Westinghouse 5 burner gas cook top and electric fan oven. The informal meals area comfortably seats up to 6. Down the hall you will find 3 good sized bedrooms with block out blinds and BIR's. The modern bathroom boasts a newly updated corner shower with built in recess, large vanity with quality fittings, good sized bath and heat lamps for those chilly mornings. Outside offers an excellent enclosed entertaining area complete with built in BBQ, café blinds and secure steel gates perfect for securing your pets. You will also find a garden shed surrounded by established gardens and fruit trees with an irrigation system in place. The rear yard features both paved and grass areas with good fencing, ideal for children or your four-legged friends. This beautiful home is ideally located in a quiet court in Leopold next to Paech Park, approx 1km to local shopping centre, less than 15 mins drive to Geelong CBD and 15 mins drive to the Bellarine wine region.
FEATURES
• Quiet Court Location next to Paech Park
• Split System Heating and cooling
• 698 m2 Block
• DLUG
• Rent pw $400 approx
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
When Location is Key
This remarkable home is situated on an impressive 594m2 approx. allotment in a central location like no other. Ideally positioned within walking distance to all amenities; Leopold Sporting precinct, the Gateway Plaza, Leopold Primary School, public transport and the Leopold Community Hub. While easy access to the Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsula being only 15 minutes away is a bonus.
Presenting this incredible five-bedroom home, this property has room for the whole family. The first of the five bedrooms is the master, completed with a generous walk in robe & large private ensuite including classy corner spa-bath. Bedroom 3 also offers both built in robes, as well as walk in robe space and utilises a second private ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms are plentiful in size and are serviced by the stylish central bathroom and separate toilet.
The open plan kitchen, dining & living area is just one of three separate living zones with a private separate lounge, as well as the light filled rumpus/study at the front of the home. The kitchen features an island bench, 5 burner gas cooktop, built in wall over, stainless steel dishwasher and great storage space. This area is the hub of the home and certainly offers a perfect space for entertaining family and friends.
All of this is heated by 2x gas wall heaters, a toasty fire place, evaporative cooling and split system air conditioning- keeping you comfortable all year round.
Outside leads to a paved BBQ entertaining area, ideal for any family setting and all year-round enjoyment. The property further features a two-car remote garage with drive thru access to an undercover carport with plenty of space to store a caravan, boat, or third car. Added extras include gardens shed, security system, internal garage access & 1.5Kw Solar panels.
Do not miss this opportunity to purchase a stunning family home with nothing more to do than move in and enjoy. An inspection of 7 Stringers Lane, Leopold is a must!

Description:
The one that has it ALL!
Awaiting its lucky new owner, this family home needs to be at the very top of your list! A well-zoned family home equipped with all the mod cons, sublime rural views, direct access to the Bellarine Rail Trail, a grand outdoor entertaining space and rear access with room for all your toys, this is the home that has it all, for the family who want it all!
Perfectly tucked away at the end of a private Cul De Sac and sitting upon a generous 839m2, a recent refresh throughout leaves you with nothing left to do but simply move in, put your feet up and enjoy. Upon entry, you're greeted by a separate lounge and study, which flows to an open plan kitchen, equipped with newly installed 40mm stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances including electric oven, gas cook top, dishwasher and ample storage, which overlooks an expansive living, dining and tranquil sitting nook. 4 bedrooms sprawl from the rear central hallway, the master retreat is equipped with ensuite, walk-in-robe and garden views, bedrooms 2 and 3 are both sun-drenched with natural light and offers rural views, while bedroom 4 overlooks the garden and all boast built-in-robes. A main bathroom with shower, vanity and tiled in bath, separate toilet, laundry with outdoor access and year round comfort is on offer with ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
The perfect entertainer, an expansive outdoor undercover area makes for effortless indoor/outdoor entertaining, complete with a free standing 6 seater Spa. Established foliage lead you quite literally down the garden path to a large open grassed area, which offers direct access to the Bellarine Rail Trail and potential for you to add your own touches, with enough space for extra garaging (STCA) to take full advantage of the rear access for boats, caravans, trailers and everything in between.
Showcasing amazing value for money, an opportunity to secure a home with functionality, space and charm very rarely presents itself. With all schools, public transport and the Drysdale township at your fingertips, this is the lifestyle change you have been waiting for!

Description:
1960s charm surrounded by beautiful greenery.
Meticulously maintained and adorned with charm and character, this classic 1960s home is sure to appeal to those that are in search of quality, space and tranquillity. The stunning front garden creates a private and welcoming feel and leads the way to the front door.
On entry, the craftsmanship of yesteryear is clear with ceiling roses, decorative cornices, beautiful bay windows and gleaming hardwood flooring throughout the existing home.
The front living room is light filled, features a gas log fire centrepiece, and flows through to the dining area and kitchen. The kitchen offers hardwood cabinetry, gas cooktop, gas oven, dishwasher and overlooks the back yard.
Three spacious bedrooms are located to the front of the home and are serviced by a charming central bathroom with spa bath set in a bay window.
To the rear of the home, a large second living area and secondary bathroom provides a great place for entertaining guests, and it opens out to the sunny rear deck which overlooks tranquil, and lovingly manicured gardens.
Other features include:
- Tandem double garage with adjoining carport
- Laundry with built in ironing board
- New drapes and blinds
- Re-painted and re-pointed roof
Located just a 2- minute walk to either the Dorothy Street or the Ash Road shops, just a short drive to the Gateway Plaza and just 15 minutes to the Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsular. The convenient location of this property combined with the 60s charm is sure to impress on first inspection.

Description:
Cherished Home Awaiting Its Next Chapter!
Occupying approx. 909m2, this property presents buyers with a world of opportunities! Move straight in, renovate to create your dream family home, or use the expansive land size for development (STCA)!
Located in a quiet court, youll appreciate that lifes conveniences are within easy reach. The Ash Road shops are a short walk from your front door, along with public transport and the Leopold Kindergarten. Close access to the Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, and Leopold Library makes this an ideal location for families. A short drive will find you at the popular Gateway Plaza and Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds. The Bellarine Highway provides easy access to both Geelong and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
Its easy to see that this home has been cherished over the years, with the original interiors and hardwood floors in immaculate condition. The lounge/dining area features a bay window overlooking the front garden, while French doors open onto the north-facing carport. Renovators will instantly see the appeal in transforming this outdoor zone into a leafy alfresco (STCA).
The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry, wall oven, and 900mm stainless steel gas hob and rangehood.
Zoned to the front of the home, the spacious Master Bedroom has the potential to be divided into two separate rooms. The 2nd Bedroom, main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry complete the layout.
A gas wall heater provides comfort.
The secure backyard is wonderfully spacious - children will love being able to roam and explore in their very own backyard!
Two driveways will appeal to tradies, with a double lock-up garage and single carport providing off-street parking. A garden shed and rainwater tank add the final touches to this fantastic property.
With so much to offer, youll need to act swiftly to avoid disappointment! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
NEW PRICE - Victorian homestead with development opportunity.
This classic double-fronted Victorian residence in an enviable location at the gateway to Drysdale presents an incredibly unique opportunity not to be missed.
Set on a massive 1037m2 of GRZ1 land in a high profile position and offering 2 street frontages, the home provides many options including subdivision (STCA), home business, accommodation or just enjoy the property yourself as a family residence with plenty of space to extend and improve.
A traditional Victorian facade with full return veranda welcomes you to the home, whilst a wide entry hall and 12ft ceiling creates the feeling of space seldom offered in modern living. Generous 3.6m bedrooms include BIRs and feature timber lined walls, high decorative skirts and polished Baltic floorboards. The central bathroom is tiled and boasts a gorgeous free standing claw bath, separate shower and double basins.
A generous formal lounge with fireplace is carpeted and opens through to the rear meals area which overlooks the deck and the north facing gardens.
Climate is controlled year round with ducted heating and cooling.
The commercial style kitchen, whilst functional, offers the new owners a chance to inject their own personal touch with a modern upgrade. A separate laundry and a 2nd toilet complete the internal attributes of the home.
For the hobbyist, a 6m x 3.6m studio / workshop / bungalow separate to the residence provides a flexible space to use as you see fit, whilst an undercover area is set amongst the established trees and abundance of garden beds creating the ultimate outdoor lifestyle.
Superbly positioned to enjoy the best of what the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer with local shops, restaurants and schools all close by. 100m from your doorstep, Lake Lorne offers walking/cycling tracks with stunning birdlife and native trees. The reserves across the road have family BBQ areas and children's playground, whilst the famous
Q Train/Blues Train boards less than 100m from your doorstep.
An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home in an amazing location. Call Dion Plumb now to learn more on 0424 940 629

Description:
Brand New Home in Boutique Development
Located in Central Walk Estate, Drysdales new boutique residential development, this brand new family home offers an enviable, relaxed lifestyle - just 200 metres from the town centre. Working to a contemporary masterplan, the estate incorporates numerous views to nearby hills populated with mature eucalypts, plus a central reserve that features a creek running through stunning wetlands. Everything here looks as fresh as a daisy. Custom designed by a local builder, this quality home sits comfortably on the lower side of elevated Platinum Avenue, with a neat terraced front garden and a double lock-up garage. From the covered portico, a polished-timber passage leads down to the generous open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge area, while along the way is the master bedroom with its walk-in robe and sparkling ensuite, a lounge/entertainment room with double doors, and a laundry equipped with plenty of cupboard space. The kitchen boasts premium appliances including twin Westinghouse electric ovens, a Technika 5-burner gas cooktop, an Omega dishwasher, and island bench with two sinks, and a walk-in pantry. The lounge/dining section opens onto a covered deck thats made for made for outdoor dining and entertainment. Adjacent to this main living hub are three more bedrooms which share the main bathroom (bath and shower) and a separate WC. Theres remotely controlled heating and cooling throughout, plus a split system and ceiling fans. As the name Central Walk suggests, its an easy walk to just about everything youll need - shops, schools, cafes and restaurants. This is a great opportunity to make a new start in a new home, in a new and vibrant precinct - with all the essentials on your doorstep.
